About

Hi everyone, my name is Tristan Aditya Dermawan. I'm a Front-end web Developer, Informatics Student. I live in Probolinggo, Indonesia. I was born in Probolinggo, 23 April 2002. I'm 20 years old. I'm an Accountant Information Sistem Student from Universitas Amik Taruna Probolinggo. Coding has been my passion and hobby since I was 18 years old, and I love computer since I was a kid. Besides coding, I love listening to music. My favorite genres are Post-hardcore, Metalcore, and Jazz, and here's my music playlist. I like playing games too. My favorite genre is First Person Shooter Sometimes I watch anime, but I prefer watching western movies and series.
